titleStmt.title: Paradise within us: or, The happie mind. By Robert Crofts
titleStmt.author: R. C. (Robert Crofts)

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by B. Alsop and T. Fawcet,

notesStmt.note: Additional engraved title page reads: The happie mind. Or A compendious direction to obtaine the same. By R.C. Gent.
Running title reads: The happie mind.
Identified as STC 4299 on UMI microfilm, reel 1541.
Reproductions of the originals in the British Library.
Appears at reel 984 ³ (British Library copy, lacks engraved title page), and at reel 1541 đ (British Library copy, lacking letterpress title page).
